title: [Lumnea Meadow]
description: A hawthorn tree perches atop a small rise in the grassy meadow.  Its delicate white blossoms drift in the air, scenting the breeze with a faint fragrance.  A thick bed of pink and purple anemone surrounds the base of the gnarled tree.

A hawthorn tree perches atop a small rise in the grassy meadow.  Its delicate white blossoms glow faintly in the silvery starlight filtering down through the tree's gossamer branches.  A thick bed of flowers surrounds the base of the gnarled tree.
